body: LEAD: A Federal judge today approved an agreement intended to halt the pollution of New York Harbor and the Jersey Shore by garbage from the city's Fresh Kills Landfill on Staten Island. body: LEAD: SOMETIME next year, probably in the summer, condominiums at a new waterfront development called Jonathan's Landing are to go on sale. body: LEAD: The 112-day odyssey of the Mobro, the world's most famous garbage barge, appeared to be over today as New York City agreed to burn its load at an incinerator in Brooklyn. body: LEAD: A New York City police officer was arrested and charged with drunken driving yesterday after he was involved in a minor collision in Brooklyn, the authorities said.
